1604813400.title: In Business Africa
1604813400.descr: In Business Africa is a BBC weekly news program, hosted by Nancy Kacungira in Lagos, Nigeria and Lerato Mbele in Johannesburg, South Africa. 1604835000.title: Newsnight
1604835000.descr: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and trade union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. 1604845800.title: Made on Earth
1604845800.descr: Made on Earth reveals fascinating stories behind products and items we use in our every day life. The hosts Babita Sharma and Finn Aberdein explore the places and things that transform the way we live and work and study how global network is adjusting to the changing needs. The series focuses on how certain items are produced and processed, from coffee to whiskey, handbags to spices.
